name: Pablo's "Pearls Before Swine" Characters Online Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text:
I am greedy. 
My only two priorities are to get rich and to get famous.
questions.explanation:
Rat.

	Seriously, Rat only has two priorities.

questions.text:
I have a funny accent. 
I always try to capture Zebra.
questions.explanation:
A crocodile.

	Man, those crocodiles are stupid! Their plans to capture Zebra stink!

questions.text:
I am dim-witted. 
I am also very fat.
questions.explanation:
Pig.

	Pig is almost as stupid as the crocodiles. A giant oven mitt is not going to protect you from anything!

questions.text:
I am very smart. 
I may be even smarter than Zebra.
questions.explanation:
Goat.

	Goat is very smart. Pig and Rat are tedious for him to be around because they are dumb.

questions.text:
I am Pig's girlfriend. 
I get ultra mood swings. 
My nickname is Moody.
questions.explanation:
Pigita.

	First Pigita is telling Pig that she wants to marry him, and then she's telling him that she wants to punch him in the face.

questions.text: I was Pig's guardian angel, but I was actually a fake.
questions.explanation:
Niko.

	Niko was actually a criminal pretending to be a guardian angel.

questions.text:
I am Pig's sister. 
I am germ freak.
questions.explanation:
Farina.

	Farina was such a germ freak that she put herself a germ-free bubble with nothing but an air passage.

questions.text:
I am smart. 
You may confuse me with a horse.
questions.explanation:
Zebra.

	Zebra is like the second smartest character in the strip!

questions.text:
I am Rat's strip's main character. 
I captured Cathy and held her hostage.
questions.explanation:
Dickie the Cockroach.

	Man, that Dickie the Cockroach is crazy. He captured Cathy the cartoon character.

questions.text:
You may confuse me with a teddy bear. 
I have five o'clock shadow.
questions.explanation:
Wee Bear.

	Wee Bear is very sensitive, in my opinion. He has sympathy for oppressed workers.
